channel.title: Posts on Na Jin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Na Jin's Blog

item.title: Fiction Reources
item.description: Here are some helpful sources for creating a novel. Text editor - Any editors are okay. I preper to use Goodle Doc, free and easy to access. Mind Mapping - https://app.diagrams.net The online novels platform - https://alphanovel.io

item.title: Zhuling's Christmas Eve
item.description: Merry Christmas! This case always makes me sad. It is a simple case but the crime suspect is still on the loose up to today. Woman whose mystery poisoning captivated China for decades dies By Chris Lau and Simone McCarthy, CNN 4 minute read Updated 3:13 AM EST, Mon December 25, 2023 A woman who was left incapacitated for decades after being poisoned as a college student in a high-profile cold case in China has died at the age of 50.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome I am an amateur writer. Blogging which is my one of paused long-standing hobbies, was awake by the popularity of open AI in 2023. My personal words or little thoughts are like tiny dusts in the vast universe. They are even nothing comparing with Artificial intelligence. The everything, however, I recorded is valuable for my life as a human being. Whether what I do is meaningful though, I still insist to start my blogging.
